Investor_7_pre_3.name: Hannah Muller
Investor_7_pre_3.content: Throughout the investment process, I exhibited a strong commitment to a collaborative and fair partnership with my trustee, actively engaging in discussions and aligning my investment goals with the allocation plan provided by Sergey. My approach underscored my reliability and responsibility in resource management. Following a successful outcome from the investment, I believe my reputation has been bolstered as a discerning and trustworthy investor who prioritizes both returns and trust.

Investor_7_pre_4.name: Hannah Muller
Investor_7_pre_4.content: I demonstrated strong commitment and reliability throughout the investment process, actively engaging in discussions to ensure alignment with my goals. My responsible resource management and successful profit realization have solidified my reputation as a discerning investor who values trust and returns.

Trustee_7_pre_5.name: Hannah Muller
Trustee_7_pre_5.content: I executed the proposed allocation plan with precision and efficiency, successfully delivering the promised 30% profits without any discrepancies. This performance highlights my disciplined approach, enhancing my reputation as a reliable trustee focused on meticulous planning and execution. I prioritize both securing my own advantage and safeguarding investor interests. As a result, my trustworthiness, pro-social behavior, and competence are evident in this transaction, placing me in a strong competitive position in the market.

Trustee_7_pre_6.name: Hannah Muller
Trustee_7_pre_6.content: I have successfully executed the investment process with precision and transparency, delivering the promised 30% returns as agreed. This performance reinforces my reputation for reliability, pro-social behavior, and effective resource management, elevating my credibility within the investment community. My consistent adherence to the agreed terms and my commitment to investor interests further enhance my standing in future endeavours.
